alert.note: Alert for Codington; Day; Grant; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 1:30PM MDT until May 30 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROBERTS...SOUTHEASTERN DAY...NORTHWESTERN GRANT AND NORTHERN CODINGTON COUNTIES... At 230 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near South Shore, or 18 miles north of Watertown, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waubay, Summit, Ortley, Enemy Swim Housing, Waubay Lake, Minnewasta Lake, Rudebusch Corner, Blue Dog Lake, Waubay Wildlife Rec Area, Enemy Swim Lake, Campbell Slough, Rush Lake, Bitter Lake and Antelope Lake. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
